channel.title: *CLICK HERE* RitzscapeV2 is back JOIN NOW! (317)(24/7 *CLICK HERE*
channel.description:
RitzscapeV2 is back will tons more customs and tons more npc(boss) and new staff members. :D
[b]CLient:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?kp9kimwrns7czq4]http://www.mediafire.com/?kp9kimwrns7czq4[/url][/b]
Custom shop NPC's (coin credits): Santa - you can buy Christmas items from here. Sigmund the merchant - buy items like demon wings, rings ect. ghost farmer - buy custom armor (gold trimed). Rug merchant - buy masks and other items lie that.
PK areas: Edgeville Magebank Varrok
Monster teles: rockcrabs dagg lair island cave slayer tower
Minigames: barrows fightpits pest cntr assault
Boss: kbd bandos arymidal saradomin corporeal
